languages.text: Но не всем в команде так повезло — несколько глупцов унеслись вглубь темного коридора... прямо к пасти искореженной вертикальной шахты. Эхо их криков продолжало звучать еще целую минуту после того, как смерть забирала несчастных.

traits.locale_text: Но не всем в команде так повезло — несколько скаутов унеслись вглубь темного коридора... прямо к пасти искореженной вертикальной шахты. Эхо их криков продолжало звучать еще целую минуту после того, как смерть забирала несчастных.

languages.text: But not everyone in the unit was so lucky — several foolish crew members bolted down the dark passageway... right into the waiting maw of a twisted vertical shaft. Their screams continued to echo for a full minute after death had claimed them.
languages.original_text: Но не всем в команде так повезло — несколько глупцов унеслись вглубь темного коридора... прямо к пасти искореженной вертикальной шахты. Эхо их криков продолжало звучать еще целую минуту после того, как смерть забирала несчастных.

traits.locale_text: But not everyone in the unit was so lucky — several foolish crew members bolted down the dark passageway... right into the waiting maw of a twisted vertical shaft. Their screams continued to echo for a full minute after death had claimed them.

But not everyone in the unit was so lucky — several foolish crew members bolted down the dark passageway... right into the waiting maw of a twisted vertical shaft. Their screams continued to echo for a full minute after death had claimed them.

But not everyone in the unit was so lucky — several foolish crew members bolted down the dark passageway... right into the waiting maw of a twisted vertical shaft. Their screams continued to echo for a full minute after death had claimed them.

But not everyone in the unit was so lucky — several foolish crew members bolted down the dark passageway... right into the waiting maw of a twisted vertical shaft. Their screams continued to echo for a full minute after death had claimed them.

languages.text: Sin embargo, no todos en la unidad tuvieron la misma suerte. Varios tripulantes insensatos corrieron por el oscuro pasadizo... cayendo por un pozo retorcido. El eco de sus gritos aún resonaba un minuto después de que murieran.
languages.original_text: But not everyone in the unit was so lucky — several foolish crew members bolted down the dark passageway... right into the waiting maw of a twisted vertical shaft. Their screams continued to echo for a full minute after death had claimed them.

traits.locale_text: Sin embargo, no todos en la unidad tuvieron la misma suerte. Varios tripulantes insensatos corrieron por el oscuro pasadizo... cayendo por un pozo retorcido. El eco de sus gritos aún resonaba un minuto después de que murieran.

languages.text: 然而，并不是每个人都像行商浪人这么幸运。几位愚蠢的船员从黑暗的通道上跳了下去……直接跳进了某个竖直、扭曲的巨口之中。他们的尖叫声回荡了整整一分钟，才渐渐消散。
languages.original_text: But not everyone in the unit was so lucky — several foolish crew members bolted down the dark passageway... right into the waiting maw of a twisted vertical shaft. Their screams continued to echo for a full minute after death had claimed them.

traits.locale_text: 然而，并不是每个人都像行商浪人这么幸运。几位愚蠢的船员从黑暗的通道上跳了下去……直接跳进了某个竖直、扭曲的巨口之中。他们的尖叫声回荡了整整一分钟，才渐渐消散。

languages.text: しかし、部隊の全員がそれほど幸運だったわけではない。何人かの哀れなクルーが暗い通路を急いで駆け降りて…待ち構えていたねじれた垂直シャフトのマウにそのまま突っ込んだ。彼らの叫び声は、死に飲みこまれるまで、丸1分響き続けた。
languages.original_text: But not everyone in the unit was so lucky — several foolish crew members bolted down the dark passageway... right into the waiting maw of a twisted vertical shaft. Their screams continued to echo for a full minute after death had claimed them.

traits.locale_text: しかし、部隊の全員がそれほど幸運だったわけではない。何人かの哀れなクルーが暗い通路を急いで駆け降りて…待ち構えていたねじれた垂直シャフトのマウにそのまま突っ込んだ。彼らの叫び声は、死に飲みこまれるまで、丸1分響き続けた。

languages.text: Aber so viel Glück hatte nicht die ganze Einheit – einige törichte Mitglieder stürmten in den dunklen Gang ... und direkt in den wartenden Schlund eines vertikalen Schachts. Ihre Schreie hallten noch eine ganze Minute wider, nachdem der Tod sie zu sich geholt hatte.
languages.original_text: But not everyone in the unit was so lucky — several foolish crew members bolted down the dark passageway... right into the waiting maw of a twisted vertical shaft. Their screams continued to echo for a full minute after death had claimed them.

traits.locale_text: Aber so viel Glück hatte nicht die ganze Einheit – einige törichte Mitglieder stürmten in den dunklen Gang ... und direkt in den wartenden Schlund eines vertikalen Schachts. Ihre Schreie hallten noch eine ganze Minute wider, nachdem der Tod sie zu sich geholt hatte.

languages.text: Hélas, tous n'eurent pas cette chance. Rendus fous par la peur, plusieurs membres d'équipage s'élancèrent dans un couloir sombre... et se jetèrent droit dans la gueule béante d'un puits tordu. Leurs hurlements continuèrent à résonner pendant une minute entière après leur chute mortelle.
languages.original_text: But not everyone in the unit was so lucky — several foolish crew members bolted down the dark passageway... right into the waiting maw of a twisted vertical shaft. Their screams continued to echo for a full minute after death had claimed them.

traits.locale_text: Hélas, tous n'eurent pas cette chance. Rendus fous par la peur, plusieurs membres d'équipage s'élancèrent dans un couloir sombre... et se jetèrent droit dans la gueule béante d'un puits tordu. Leurs hurlements continuèrent à résonner pendant une minute entière après leur chute mortelle.

languages.text: Yine de birimdeki herkesin şansı yaver gitmemişti. Ahmak birkaç mürettebat mensubu, karanlık geçide doğru depar attı ve... Bükülmüş dikey boşluğun aç bekleyen ağzı onları karşıladı. Ölüm, zavallıları oracıkta yanına alsa da çığlıkları kısa süreliğine yankılanmaya devam etti.
languages.original_text: But not everyone in the unit was so lucky — several foolish crew members bolted down the dark passageway... right into the waiting maw of a twisted vertical shaft. Their screams continued to echo for a full minute after death had claimed them.

traits.locale_text: Yine de birimdeki herkesin şansı yaver gitmemişti. Ahmak birkaç mürettebat mensubu, karanlık geçide doğru depar attı ve… Bükülmüş dikey boşluğun açlıkla bekleyen ağzı onları karşıladı. Ölüm, zavallıları yanına aldı ancak çığlıkları kısa süreliğine yankılanmaya devam etti.
